s0151.chinese: 因復奉車從攻南陽，戰於藍田、芷陽，以兵車趣攻戰疾，至霸上。
s0151.idiomatic: When Quan died, his son Han Ping succeeded him.

s0152.chinese: 項羽至，滅秦，立沛公為漢王。
s0152.idiomatic: When Ping died, his son Han Fu succeeded him.

s0153.chinese: 漢王賜嬰爵列侯，號昭平侯，復為太仆，從入蜀、漢。
s0153.idiomatic: When Fu died, his son Han Gong succeeded him.

s0154.idiomatic: When Gong died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0155.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Ling succeeded him.

s0156.idiomatic: When Ling died, his son Han Zhou succeeded him.

s0157.idiomatic: When Zhou died, his son Han Tai succeeded him.

s0158.chinese: 漢王急，馬罷，虜在後，常蹶兩兒欲棄之，嬰常收，竟載之，徐行面雍樹乃馳。
s0158.idiomatic: When Tai died, his son Han Cheng succeeded him.

s0159.chinese: 漢王怒，行欲斬嬰者十餘，卒得脫，而致孝惠、魯元於豐。
s0159.idiomatic: When Cheng died, his son Han Xuan succeeded him.

s0160.chinese: 漢王既至滎陽，收散兵，復振，賜嬰食祈陽。
s0160.idiomatic: When Xuan died, his son Han Ji succeeded him.

s0161.chinese: 復常奉車從擊項籍，追至陳，卒定楚，至魯，益食茲氏。
s0161.idiomatic: When Ji died, his son Han Yin succeeded him.

s0162.idiomatic: When Yin died, his son Han Xi succeeded him.

s0163.chinese: 其秋，燕王臧荼反，嬰以太仆從擊荼。
s0163.idiomatic: When Xi died, his son Han Zhuang succeeded him.

s0164.idiomatic: When Zhuang died, his son Han Kai succeeded him.

s0165.chinese: 更食汝陰，剖符世世勿絕。
s0165.idiomatic: When Kai died, his son Han Hao succeeded him.

s0166.chinese: 以太仆從擊代，至武泉、雲中，益食千戶。
s0166.idiomatic: When Hao died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

s0167.chinese: 因從擊韓信軍胡騎晉陽旁，大破之。
s0167.idiomatic: When Yong died, his son Han Jing succeeded him.

s0168.chinese: 追北至平城，為胡所圍，七日不得通。
s0168.idiomatic: When Jing died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0169.chinese: 高帝使使厚遺閼氏，冒頓開圍一角。
s0169.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Tao succeeded him.

s0170.chinese: 高帝出欲馳，嬰固徐行，弩皆持滿外向，卒得脫。
s0170.idiomatic: When Tao died, his son Han Song succeeded him.

s0171.idiomatic: When Song died, his son Han Chen succeeded him.

s0172.chinese: 復以太仆從擊胡騎句注北，大破之。
s0172.idiomatic: When Chen died, his son Han Yang succeeded him.

s0173.chinese: 以太仆擊胡騎平城南，三陷陳，功為多，賜所奪邑五百戶。
s0173.idiomatic: When Yang died, his son Han Jun succeeded him.

s0174.chinese: 以太仆擊陳豨、黥布軍，陷陳卻敵，益食千戶，定食汝陰六千九百戶，除前所食。
s0174.idiomatic: When Jun died, his son Han Yu succeeded him.

s0175.chinese: 嬰自上初起沛，常為太仆，竟高祖崩。
s0175.idiomatic: When Yu died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.

s0176.idiomatic: When Quan died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

s0177.chinese: 孝惠帝及高后德嬰之脫孝惠、魯元於下邑之閒也，乃賜嬰縣北第第一，曰「近我」，以尊異之。
s0177.idiomatic: When Xiang died, his son Han Qiang succeeded him.

s0178.chinese: 孝惠帝崩，以太仆事高后。
s0178.idiomatic: When Qiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0179.chinese: 高后崩，代王之來，嬰以太仆與東牟侯入清宮，廢少帝，以天子法駕迎代王代邸，與大臣共立為孝文皇帝，復為太仆。
s0179.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Bo succeeded him.

s0180.idiomatic: When Bo died, his son Han Lian succeeded him.

s0181.idiomatic: When Lian died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0182.chinese: 子共侯賜立，三十一年卒。
s0182.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0183.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Wei succeeded him.

s0184.chinese: 立十九歲，元鼎二年，坐與父御婢姦罪，自殺，國除。
s0184.idiomatic: When Wei died, his son Han Sheng succeeded him.

s0185.chinese: 潁陰侯灌嬰者，睢陽販繒者也。
s0185.idiomatic: When Sheng died, his son Han Yi succeeded him.

s0186.chinese: 高祖之為沛公，略地至雍丘下，章邯敗殺項梁，而沛公還軍於碭，嬰初以中涓從擊破東郡尉於成武及秦軍於扛裏，疾鬬，賜爵七大夫。
s0186.idiomatic: When Yi died, his son Han Liang succeeded him.

s0187.chinese: 從攻秦軍亳南、開封、曲遇，戰疾力，賜爵執帛，號宣陵君。
s0187.idiomatic: When Liang died, his son Han Jun succeeded him.

s0188.chinese: 從攻陽武以西至雒陽，破秦軍尸北，北絕河津，南破南陽守齮陽城東，遂定南陽郡。
s0188.idiomatic: When Jun died, his son Han Kai succeeded him.

s0189.chinese: 西入武關，戰於藍田，疾力，至霸上，賜爵執珪，號昌文君。
s0189.idiomatic: When Kai died, his son Han Hao succeeded him.

s0190.chinese: 沛公立為漢王，拜嬰為郎中，從入漢中，十月，拜為中謁者。
s0190.idiomatic: When Hao died, his son Han Hong succeeded him.

s0191.chinese: 從還定三秦，下櫟陽，降塞王。
s0191.idiomatic: When Hong died, his son Han Li succeeded him.

s0192.idiomatic: When Li died, his son Han Tong succeeded him.

s0193.chinese: 從東出臨晉關，擊降殷王，定其地。
s0193.idiomatic: When Tong died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0194.chinese: 擊項羽將龍且、魏相項他軍定陶南，疾戰，破之。
s0194.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0195.chinese: 賜嬰爵列侯，號昌文侯，食杜平鄉。
s0195.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0196.chinese: 復以中謁者從降下碭，以至彭城。
s0196.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0197.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Cheng succeeded him.

s0198.chinese: 漢王遁而西，嬰從還，軍於雍丘。
s0198.idiomatic: When Cheng died, his son Han Ji succeeded him.

s0199.chinese: 王武、魏公申徒反，從擊破之。
s0199.idiomatic: When Ji died, his son Han Yu succeeded him.

s0200.chinese: 攻下黃，西收兵，軍於滎陽。
s0200.idiomatic: When Yu died, his son Han Tai succeeded him.
